text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-xPhoneOrEmailURLScheme

Language: en

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-URLScheme
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    faxFaxA telephone number served by a fax device \[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3966.txt and http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2806.txt\].
    mailtoMailtoElectronic mail address \[RFC 2368\]

    http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2368.txt
    telTelephoneA voice telephone number \[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3966.txt and http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2806.txt\].

name: XPhoneOrEmailURLScheme
title: x_PhoneOrEmailURLScheme
description: Restricts scheme to e-mail or phone numbers at which a human can be reached
